Title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
Writer: Peter Craig, Danny Strong, Suzanne Collins
Actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Plot: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her...
